name: Install and Setting
desc_card: In this video tutorial you will learn how to install FREEWAT in QGIS and how to organize the project work directory.
desc_tutorial:
This tutorial has been successfully tested on WINDOWS 10 and WINDOWS 11, using the QGIS versions 3.28 through 3.32

‚ö†Ô∏è The QGIS version used in the videos is 3.34.6 as a test ü™≤

Recommendations before starting:

  • Before starting the installation procedure make sure QGIS is NOT running on your machine
  • remember to name ALL files with only literal characters and no spaces but with underscore - example model_domain_T0.shp
  • create a project directory in (C:) -> example C:\freewat\mf0

tutorials.title: Installing FREEWAT
tutorials.desc: Learn how to install FREEWAT in QGIS.

tutorials.title: Organizing the project directory
tutorials.desc: How to organize the project work directory.
